data.oai_dc:dc: biodiversity, Congo basin, REDD+, Carbon, Samplingevent, lowland rainforest

This dataset aggregates the biodiversity observations related to trees, slime moulds, fungi, bark lichens, leaf lichens, flies, ants, birds, rodents and shrews : An assessment of the relation between carbon storage and biodiversity in the Yangambi Biosphere Reserve (D.R. Congo). See research article:Reconciling biodiversity and carbon stock conservation in an Afrotropical forest landscape.Van de Perre et al., Sci. Adv. 2018,4:eaar6603, DOI: 10.1126/sciadv.aar6603|3,370 occurrences
